candidate Profile Description.summary: Atharv Patil is a student seeking a full-time position in AI/ML/Computer Vision from May 2024, leveraging problem-solving skills, interpersonal skills, and excellent time management. Atharv aims to utilize his expertise in Python programming, PyTorch, NumPy, and Jupyter Notebook in a challenging professional environment.

education.institution: Great Learning in Association with UT Austin
education.degree: PGP in AI & ML: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
Bachelor of Technology: Computer and Communication Engineering

experience.title: Machine Learning Intern
experience.description: Applied several deep learning models to accomplish text and speech sentiment analysis. Carried out a comparative study of diverse performing techniques to find the best technique. Defended thesis for the 8th semester with the highest grade.

projects.title: Developed crowd count model for congested spaces using deep learning
projects.description: Implemented a model to count the number of people in still congested scenes in the ShanghaiTech dataset.

projects.title: Using Artificial Intelligence to Determine the Carbon Sequestration in Trees
projects.description: Utilizing computer vision to measure carbon sequestration in trees cost-effectively. Creating a model to define parameters for measuring tree dimensions through top view and side view.

research.description: Attended a 1-day symposium to meet and network with experienced entrepreneurs and like-minded STEM graduates.

Selected as one of the 10 fellows for Fall 2023 Lab2Market Cohort, a 12-week program with an award of USD 5000. Researched 25 companies/carbon funds and engaged in discussions to create business opportunities. Identified promising AI companies in the USA and created a database.
